verses.verse: Then I turned, <S%H7725><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a flying <S%H5774><s%> roll. <S%H4040><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, What <S%H4100><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> you? And I answered, <S%H559><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> a flying <S%H5774><s%> roll; <S%H4040><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof is twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he to me, This <S%H2063><s%> is the curse <S%H423><s%> that goes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth: <S%H776><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> one that steals <S%H1589><s%> shall be cut <S%H5352><s%> off as on this <S%H2088><s%> side according <S%H3644><s%> to it; and every <S%H3605><s%> one that swears <S%H7650><s%> shall be cut <S%H5352><s%> off as on that side according <S%H3644><s%> to it.

I will bring <S%H3318><s%> it forth, <S%H3318><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and it shall enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the thief, <S%H1590><s%> and into <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of him that swears <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> by my name: <S%H8034><s%> and it shall remain <S%H3885><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> and shall consume <S%H3615><s%> it with the timber <S%H6086><s%> thereof and the stones <S%H68><s%> thereof.

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, Lift <S%H5375><s%> up now <S%H4994><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that goes <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is it? And he said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is an ephah <S%H374><s%> that goes <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> moreover, This <S%H2063><s%> is their resemblance <S%H5869><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was lifted up a talent <S%H3603><s%> of lead: <S%H5777><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> is a woman <S%H802><s%> that sits <S%H3427><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah. <S%H374><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is wickedness. <S%H7564><s%> And he cast <S%H7993><s%> it into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah; <S%H374><s%> and he cast <S%H7993><s%> the weight <S%H68><s%> of lead <S%H5777><s%> on the mouth <S%H6310><s%> thereof.

Then lifted <S%H5375><s%> I up my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H3318><s%> out two <S%H8147><s%> women, <S%H802><s%> and the wind <S%H7307><s%> was in their wings; <S%H3671><s%> for they had wings <S%H3671><s%> like the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a stork: <S%H2624><s%> and they lifted <S%H5375><s%> up the ephah <S%H374><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> I to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, Where <S%H575><s%> do these <S%H1992><s%> bear <S%H3212><s%> the ephah? <S%H374><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, To build <S%H1129><s%> it an house <S%H1004><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar: <S%H8152><s%> and it shall be established, <S%H3559><s%> and set <S%H3240><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> on her own base. <S%H4369><s%>
